Title: Extends legal protection to telehealth providers in the state of New York offering telehealth reproductive health services
Summary: Extends legal protection to telehealth providers in the state of New York offering telehealth reproductive health services, regardless of the location of the patient.
LawCode: Amd ยง2999-cc, add ยง2999-ff, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to extending legal protection to telehealth providers in the state of New York offering telehealth reproductive health services
